name: Captain
rulesNotAbility: When play reaches the Captain, reveal another greed card.
rule3of3: Swap 1 treasure or Gain a coin.
title: The Captain

name: GreedHate
title: Captain Freaks Out!
rules: The game ends. Someone Gets Shot!

name: GreedKill
title: Captain Shoots wildly!
rules: The game ends. The top 2 in each category Get Shot!

name: GreedApathy
title: Loading the Gun!
rules: The game ends after one more round. Someone Gets Shot!

name: GreedSleep
title: Captain fell asleep?!
rules: The game ends. Normal scoring.

name: GreedGifts
title: Captain gives gifts.
rules: The game ends. Coins are worth double.

name: GreedCranky
title: Captain gets cranky!
rules: The game ends. The player(s) with the most treasure lose 2 treasure each.

name: behavior.Bribe
title: Bribe
rule1of3: : Gain an item.

name: behavior.Cajole
title: Cajole
rule1of3: Lose 2 items: +4

name: behavior.Deceive
title: Deceive
rule1of3: : Swap a treasure.

name: behavior.Gripe
title: Gripe
rule1of3: Pay a player 1
: Swap an item with them.

name: behavior.Hoodwink
title: Hoodwink
rule1of3: : Gain a treasure from the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: : Gain 2 treasures from the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: : Gain 3 treasures from the Captain's Greed.

name: behavior.Investigate
title: Investigate
rule1of3: : look at the bottom card of the Greed deck.
rule2of3: : look at the bottom 2 cards of the Greed deck.
rule3of3: : look at the bottom 3 cards of the Greed deck.

name: behavior.Jeer
title: Jeer
rule1of3: : Add a treasure from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: : Add 2 treasures from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: : Add 3 treasures from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: behavior.Kowtow
title: Kowtow
rule1of3: : Add a treasure from a player's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: : Add 2 treasures from a player's loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: : Add 3 treasures from a player's loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: behavior.Lie
title: Lie
rule1of3: : Add or Remove a Captain meeple then take another turn.
rule2of3: : Add or remove 2 Captain meeples then take another turn.
rule3of3: : Add or remove 3 Captain meeples then take another turn.

name: behavior.Menace
title: Menace
rule1of3: : Take an item from a player.

name: behavior.Negotiate
title: Negotiate
rule1of3: : Choose a player. Trade a treasure with that player.
rule2of3: : Choose a player. Trade 2 treasures with that player.
rule3of3: : Choose a player. Trade 3 treasures with that player.

name: behavior.Orate
title: Orate
rule1of3: : Add a treasure from the Captain's Greed to the Captain's loot.
rule2of3: : Add 2 treasures from the Captain's Greed to the Captain's loot.
rule3of3: : Add 3 treasures from the Captain's Greed to the Captain's loot.

name: behavior.Pout.png
title: Pout
rule1of3: Lose a treasure: Bury a treasure.

name: behavior.Quibble
title: Quibble
rule1of3: : Swap a treasure with one in the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: : Swap 2 treasures with 2 in the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: : Swap 3 treasures with 3 in the Captain's Greed.

name: behavior.Steal
title: Steal
rule1of3: : Take 2 coins from another player.

name: behavior.Trick
title: Trick
rule1of3: Pay a player 2
: take an item from them.

name: behavior.Vomit
title: Vomit
rule1of3: : Bury a treasure.

name: behavior.Whine
title: Whine
rule1of3: , Add a treasure from your loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule2of3: , Add 2 treasures from your loot to the Captain's Greed.
rule3of3: , Add 3 treasures from your loot to the Captain's Greed.

name: behavior.Yell
title: Yell
rule1of3: : reveal the next behavior card. Take another turn.
rule2of3: : reveal the next 2 behavior cards. Take another turn.
rule3of3: : reveal the next 3 behavior cards. Take another turn.

name: c1
rules: When you Lose a treasure to the captain, you may place it into the Captain's Greed.
title: Trevyn

name: c2
rules: When you Gain coins from the captain, Gain an extra coin.
title: Sophia

name: c3
rules: You are treated as having one more Buried treasure of your choice for scoring purposes.
title: Andrew

name: c5
rules: When you swap treasures with the captain's loot you may swap 1 additional treasure.
title: Erin

name: c9
rules: Instead of Gaining a treadure, you may Swap a treasure with the Captain's Greed.
title: Dan

name: c11
title: James
rulesNotAbility: If you have the most coins at the end of the game, gain 10 extra points.

name: c12
rules: When you Swap a treasure, you may Swap a treasure with a player instead of the Captain.
title: Taylor

name: c15
rules: When you gain and lose a treasure in the same round, you may also add a treasure from the Captain's loot to the Captain's Greed.
title: Berrett

name: c17
rules: At the end of the game before anyone gets shot; Bury two of your treasures.
title: Dwayne

name: c19
rules: Whenever you lose an item without gaining a treasure, you main Gain a coin from the captain.
title: Alison

name: c20
rulesNotAbility: When any other player activates this card, take a coin from them. You may not activate it.
title: Bryson

name: c21
title: Jacob
rulesNotAbility: When any other player activates this card, take a coin from them.
rule3of3: Gain a coin. Swap a treasure with the Captain's Greed.
